item.title: Groundbreaking ceremony finished for the Fujairah Business Centre, a mixed-use development
item.description: Al Taif Investment, a collaboration between Dubai Investments and Fujairah Investment Establishment (FIE), the investment branch of the Fujairah Government, has launched its flagship Fujairah Business Centre project. Scheduled for completion in three years with a budget of AED400 million, the project aims to be a landmark development. Located opposite the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, it features two towers with a total built-up area of 80,058 sq m. These towers include a 19-story office building and a 19-story Courtyard by Marriott hotel offering 228 rooms and apartment units.
